lever.additional:
Gojek is an equal opportunity workplace that is committed to diversity and inclusion. At Gojek we celebrate our differences, because we believe that diversity not only creates a healthier work environment for our employees, but also helps our business thrive. 



About us

Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!
lever.description:
About the team:

GoSend and GoBox form a part of the logistics suite of products, and have quickly built a reputation as the preferred provider of on-demand logistics in Indonesia delivering over 500,000 packages per day.

GoSend helps connect people: order a Gojek driver to send any item to either yourself or another receiver, whether you've forgotten your own laptop charger at home, or simply want to gift a present to your friend or loved one. C2C has never been quicker with our Gojeks delivering goods through instant courier in less than an hour.

With e-commerce in Indonesia growing at 22% per year, our e-commerce partners are counting on 3PLs like GoSend to keep up and sustainably match the growth of consumer demand through Instant and Same-Day service. Furthermore, having carved a niche in the intra-city logistics space, we are beginning to connect, and bridge 17,000 islands under one umbrella with next-day and inter-city deliveries.

We are constantly working on complex interesting problems such as Route optimisation algorithms to bring out cheaper and faster deliveries for our customers and partners. Join our mission to bring Cheaper, Faster, and more Reliable deliveries to Indonesia!

About the role:

Gojek is looking for an experienced, data-driven Senior Product Manager for the Logistics’ Routing Platform & Driver Reliability team. As a Senior Product Manager on this team, you will play a pivotal role in defining and executing the roadmap to meet objectives and key initiatives for ensuring high quality delivery experience for our customers and drivers.

We focus on areas like route optimisation problems, driver availability, and driver incentives. The goal of our team is to dramatically lower the cost of operation for our drivers, lower ETAs for customers and drivers, increase revenue for driver partners, and to improve the overall efficiency and utilisation of our fleet of supply.

You will work closely with cross-functional teams of engineers, data scientists, designers and operations teams to deliver world-class products driving the conceptual and technical development of logistics platform products.
lever.descriptionPlain:
About the team:

GoSend and GoBox form a part of the logistics suite of products, and have quickly built a reputation as the preferred provider of on-demand logistics in Indonesia delivering over 500,000 packages per day. 

GoSend helps connect people: order a Gojek driver to send any item to either yourself or another receiver, whether you've forgotten your own laptop charger at home, or simply want to gift a present to your friend or loved one. C2C has never been quicker with our Gojeks delivering goods through instant courier in less than an hour. 

With e-commerce in Indonesia growing at 22% per year, our e-commerce partners are counting on 3PLs like GoSend to keep up and sustainably match the growth of consumer demand through Instant and Same-Day service. Furthermore, having carved a niche in the intra-city logistics space, we are beginning to connect, and bridge 17,000 islands under one umbrella with next-day and inter-city deliveries. 

We are constantly working on complex interesting problems such as Route optimisation algorithms to bring out cheaper and faster deliveries for our customers and partners. Join our mission to bring Cheaper, Faster, and more Reliable deliveries to Indonesia!

About the role:

Gojek is looking for an experienced, data-driven Senior Product Manager for the Logistics’ Routing Platform & Driver Reliability team. As a Senior Product Manager on this team, you will play a pivotal role in defining and executing the roadmap to meet objectives and key initiatives for ensuring high quality delivery experience for our customers and drivers.

We focus on areas like route optimisation problems, driver availability, and driver incentives. The goal of our team is to dramatically lower the cost of operation for our drivers, lower ETAs for customers and drivers, increase revenue for driver partners, and to improve the overall efficiency and utilisation of our fleet of supply.

You will work closely with cross-functional teams of engineers, data scientists, designers and operations teams to deliver world-class products driving the conceptual and technical development of logistics platform products.

lists.content:
• Owning the objectives & key results for your team across the multiple streams of work
  • Creating short term & mid term product strategy for the respective streams
  • Define clear and well-scoped requirements documents that are easily understood by technical and non-technical audience
  • Cross-functional collaboration with engineering, product, design, data science and driver operations to ensure a seamless product development
  • Organising & managing team practices, communications and reporting progress to all stakeholders 
  • Drive ideation, product strategy and execution for your product division, partnering with your product development team and cross-functional stakeholders
  • Monitor, analyse and report on key product product, business and customer metrics 
  • Plan and participate in user research initiatives with the design and user research teams to understand customer problems and identify and iterate on product ideas and improvements 
  • Work with our Business Intelligence and Analytics team to understand driver behavior and identify problems and opportunities

• 5+ years of product management experience, ideally working on consumer-facing, large-scale products
  • Analytical and data-driven, you love digging into the data to understand what’s happening and define & measure success on every project
  • Successful track record in planning, developing and executing strategy for multiple projects while collaborating cross-functionally
  • Ability to easily transition from high-level strategic thinking to detailed execution
  • You’re entrepreneurial and are comfortable working in a complex and fast-paced environment
  • You’re passionate about your customers and always bring questions back to what will serve them best
  • You’re fluent in English and are a confident communicator
  • Experience as a product analyst or data scientist or software engineer is a plus
